name: Gasu, The Hugging Dragon
description:
Made for the Short and Sweet Jam! This game was an experiment with the Bitsy engine. It was very fun to make so I hope you enjoy playing it!

Move with the arrow keys and touch objects to interact with them. Can also move by clicking in the play area with the mouse.

Now proudly featured as a showcase piece in the Paper x Pixel exhibition being put on by Babycastles!
